lead_paragraph: Didier Drogba scored a hat trick in Chelsea’s 3-1 victory at Levski Sofia in Bulgaria yesterday, and Barcelona needed a goal by Lionel Messi in the 89th minute for a 1-1 draw at Werder Bremen in the European Champions League.
snippet: Didier Drogba scored a hat trick in Chelsea’s 3-1 victory at Levski Sofia in Bulgaria yesterday, and Barcelona needed a goal by Lionel Messi in the 89th minute for a 1-1 draw at Werder Bremen in the European Champions League.
